payload.query: Implement messaging system for inter-agent communication. Design and deploy event bus architecture using pub/sub pattern (consider Redis Pub/Sub, RabbitMQ, or NATS). Define standardized message format (JSON schema) for agent-to-agent communication. Implement message types: task_assignment, status_update, information_request, information_response, escalation, collaboration_request. Create agent discovery service so agents can find and communicate with each other. Build message queue monitoring and logging.
payload.title: PHASE 2.1: Build Inter-Agent Communication Framework
